Articles.Content:
I keep getting Brooke Kerman.

Brooke is one of my ex-girlfriends form high school. Maybe she's in control of a network that hacks my game to make sure she gets in almost all of my games.
My first rescue contract produced a female kerbal by the name of Debris. I didn't know that rescued kerbals join your roster so that was nice .
I've seen "Kirmin Kerman". Which is tres cool to begin with, but what's better is, I have two game saves on my PC and Kirmin has popped up in both!

Twice I got a SeÃƒÂ n Kerman and scince I have that mod that gives the Kerbals different suits, I gave him a green one for Jacksepticeye.

Edited November 6, 2015 by CommanderSonic

I have scientist called Annie. Typical name, eh?

Yeah. It's male Kerbal.

Few seconds ago I hired Local Kerman. I think he's not gonna travel further than to Minmus, guess why.

Crisis Kerman was hired and I (just to joke) wasted all my money that day.

Mitgas Kerman.(or German) I wouldn't want to share a pod with him.
Got a contract to rescue Leia Kerman from LKO. Sadly I don't have a Luke or Han Kerman for the rescue.

http://i.imgur.com/3gW4kGT.png

I only send this guy on solo missions, and even then I keep him away from any Kerbal nearby.

EDIT: Woah, what the heck happened to this picture

WHAT IS THAT. Seriously.

Got a contract to rescue Leia Kerman from LKO. Sadly I don't have a Luke or Han Kerman for the rescue.

Well, that's gonna be some rescue.

When you go in, make sure you have a plan for getting out??
Sigmania Kerman. I thought it was hilarious.
i just got a rescue contract for Titrude Kerman.

The rarest of them all...
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8eS6B2f.png[/IMG]
I have 2 scientists called wirhlin and derble. I'm building them their own crazy station for their zany experiments.

Kermin Kerman
Hardas Kerman are my favorites.
I have an "Elon Kerman" in one game save.
I just found Frosen Kerman. Spelled that way.

[quote name='Bluegillbronco2']Hardas Kerman are my favorites.[/QUOTE]

That is one of the best I have heard!

Now I have twins.
Billy-Bobbles and Billy-Bobble.
I can still remember the day in 0.25 when i got Kirk kerman :D. I immedietly made him the captain of my space carrier. Unfortunetly that save is gone :(.
For missions that require no particular skills or qualities, call for Generick Kerman.

Kerbin Kerman.

Now imagine that in real life.

"Hello Earth!"

Aldrin Kerman, my 1st on the Mun way back when
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lgeC1D1.jpg[/IMG]
Wildas Kerman just landed on Duna last week.
Here: http://imgur.com/heiCB4L

I also recall reports of kerbals named "Dil-- Kerman".

*name censored because the word is inappropriate and I don't want any infractions (can you believe I never got one?)
